entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Blind River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:10 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain or drizzle near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
